channel.title: Ex-rendum server question
channel.description:
I am brand new to this rs-ps stuff. I am using ExRendums server/client and its pretty good so far. The only thing I cannot find is where to change the point where you respawn when you die. Right now he has it in some kind of rc alter, and there is no portal to get out.
Anyone use this ExRendum server before and know how to change that? :|

item.title: Ex-rendum server question
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I’ve never even heard of this source. So either look in Client.Java or Config.Java if it’s a PI.

Read full topic
